overview: Shaykhon marries Dalal the dancer and gives birth to twins, and steals her money to buy her bar, Dalal seizes the opportunity to cover up her husband on his sister-in-law who escapes from prison, the police report him in revenge, Sheikhon enters the prison and goes out after years and have great wealth and seeks revenge on his wife and education His sons, but the past is back to ruin his life again.
title: Sons and Murderers
